title: How many ways can 7 of 10 books be arranged on a shelf? - Quora

response.answer_text: Two possible answers because you're question lacks clarity (no offence intended). You're selecting 7 books out of 10 then arranging them on a shelf. If so, then the number of ways to do that is: 10C7 × 7! i.e 10P7 = 604800 ways.You have 10 books and you pick 7 particular books and the initial selection of the 7 books aren't important as you know exactly which 7 you're going to place on the shelf. Then the possible arrangements are simply, 7! i.e 5040.
